mapper.update:
update line
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
section_ids = #{sectionIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_names = #{stationNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},
